verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A tiny vessel
Lord to Thee I bring
A heart that sought from
Every earthly spring
To gain its longing
But was empty still
I bring it now to Thee
To take and fill

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thy grace that measured
Once the distance deep
Of Calvary's woe to
Seek and save Thy sheep
Has touched this heart and
Made it long for Thee
Thyself its Treasure
And its All to be

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thy glory now at
God's right hand above
Supreme of all in
That blest scene of love
In sonship tells that
Heart its wondrous place
In Thee accepted
By the Father's grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thy fullness Lord
Of light and love divine
No thought can grasp
Or human mind define
The whole vast scene of
Glory will display
That fullness in a
Quickly coming day

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
When all things filled
By Thee are wholly blest
And God's deep love
Eternally shall rest
In that which ever speaks
To Him of Thee
Thy greatness Lord
The universe shall see

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
But ere that day of
Bliss and joy supreme
When Thou shalt be
Of every tongue the theme
Let this small vessel prove
Thy gracious power
To fill and satisfy it every hour

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Thy beauties Lord
Thy holy precious worth
Surpassing far the
Fairest joys of earth
Shall then absorb its true and constant love
Thyself its Object in
Those scenes above

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
And filled with Thee
And formed through grace divine
By all that fills it
Hold it Lord as Thine
To be in joy and
Peace that knows no fear
The happy vessel
Of Thy pleasure here
